channel.title: Projects on Data Analytics Arg
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Data Analytics Arg

item.title: Project 1: Scraping Slogans
item.description: Created a tool to extract some slogans related to Data Analytics and Big Data projects. Scraped over 300 phrases from different webs using python. Basic NLP Applied. Created a Word Cloud to visualize the results Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: Scraping newspaper articles
item.description: Created a tool to extract articles from Pagina12 using Python. Loaded-data into a PostgreSQL database using a Python script. Automation of processes based on Airflow Link to GitHub Repository
